distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
gimp was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2016-4994: Use-after-free vulnerabilities in the channel and layer properties parsing process (bsc#986021).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

relationships.relates_to_product_reference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Software Development Kit 11 SP4

notes.text: Use-after-free vulnerability in the xcf_load_image function in app/xcf/xcf-load.c in GIMP allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (program crash) or possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted XCF file.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
